t: What's in a name? Northwell Health renaming shows power of brand in consumer-driven healthcare | Healthcare Finance News
s: The former North Shore-Long Island Jewish health system had a problem, albeit a good one. While the system was already among the biggest in New York, the "Long Island" moniker was keeping it from broader name recognition beyond the boundaries of that suburban area.
